snippet: Officials and bankers have convened a second Vienna Initiative, similar to the one in 2009 that prevented Eastern Europe from being sucked into the financial crisis.
abstract: Officials and bankers convene a second Vienna Initiative to protect Eastern Europe's banks, similar to the one in 2009 that prevented region from being sucked into the financial crisis; effort will try to ensure regulators do not work at cross purposes, inadvertently causing a flight of capital as banks respond to pressure to reduce risk.
lead_paragraph: Officials and bankers have convened a second Vienna Initiative, similar to the one in 2009 that prevented Eastern Europe from being sucked into the financial crisis.

headline.seo: A Renewed Multilateral Effort to Protect East European Banks
headline.main: Officials Unite Again to Protect Eastern Europe’s Banks
headline.print_headline: Officials Unite Again to Protect Eastern Europe’s Banks
